item.title: New York subway ends its MetroCard era and switches fully to tap-and-go fares
item.description: The New York City transit system is retiring the MetroCard after more than 30 years

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Saturday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Saturday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 05-20-34-39-62, Powerball: 1
